description: Creates the WorkMail application in IAM Identity Center that can be used later in the WorkMail - IdC integration. For more information, see PutIdentityProviderConfiguration. This action does not affect the authentication settings for any WorkMail organizations.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the IAM Identity Center application.

parameters.name: InstanceArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the instance.

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: The idempotency token associated with the request. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

nested_items.name: ApplicationArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the application.
